channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 5 Foot branch obstruction, 29th January
item.description:
A large and spiky branch of a tree has fallen down and is now lying on the road. It is slightly protruding and a danger to the road- cyclists and cars.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Danby Street, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: DIrt and Grime by lift entrance at Campbell and Glennie Court, 29th January
item.description:
Please remove the dirt and grime at the entrance to lift at Glennie Court and to the two entrances of the lift at Campbell Court

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stains from urine or liquid at Bew Court, 29th January
item.description:
Please clean and remove the stains and and evidence of urination of liquid at Bew Court on the both the North and the South of the building on the fourth and fifth floor.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Lack of parkıng spaces, 29th January
item.description:
The car has been left there for at least a 2 weeks now and the windows are down keys in it I checked if it’s stolen or untaxed but it doesn’t show anything and we are already having difficulty with parking as there’s limited spaces in the street and there’s other cars that don’t move for weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Morston Gardens, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Handprints and grafitti on the wall, 29th January
item.description:
At Glennie Court there is Handprints on wall as you enter ground floor Glennie Court lift area and Graffiti on the ground floor /first floor at Glennie Court. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Wall need washing, 29th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Firemans Alley, Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Dumped tonne bags, 29th January
item.description:
Tonne bags of sand have been dumped in this green space, creating an eye sore and a lack of maintenence. They have been here since July 2025. Attempts have been made to have them removed, however this has proved unsuccessful.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruct visibility for drivers, cyclists, and pedestrians., 29th January
item.description:
A white Nissan has been illegally or irresponsibly parked at Duriun way, Erith for an extended period, creating a hazard for other road users. This can indeed be dangerous, as a car left on the road for a week. I would be grateful if parking enforcement officer, can do the needful. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duriun Way, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Planter Alexis St LTN Moved Again, 29th January
item.description:
The central planter blocking vehicular access on Alexis St has been moved again so vehicles can go through. A permanent fix is needed here as it is dangerous for pedestrians and cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexis Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low hanging tree branches, 29th January
item.description:
Lovely little tree but it's branches are hanging down across the pavement. As clearence from branch to ground it desperately needs a trim please. I've walked into it in the light; dangerous in the dark. Please attend. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highlands Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blanket of broken glass, 29th January
item.description:
Been here for a number of weeks. Spread all over the pavement up to the wall and into the grass as well. Need careful thorough clean up as danger to school kids and dogs. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northfield Avenue, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
